org.knime.core.node.port.database.reader

Interface DBReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBReaderImpl

    public interface DBReader
    Since:
    3.1
    Author:
    Tobias Koetter, KNIME.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SQL_QUERY_SEPARATOR
      Separator used to decided which SQL statements should be execute line-by-line; the semicolon is not part of the executed query.

    • Field Detail

      • SQL_QUERY_SEPARATOR

        static final String SQL_QUERY_SEPARATOR
        Separator used to decided which SQL statements should be execute line-by-line; the semicolon is not part of the executed query. We need the \n in addition to the semicolon to ensure that commands that contain a ; are handled correctly!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryConnection

        DatabaseQueryConnectionSettings getQueryConnection()
        Returns:
        connection settings object

      • updateQuery

        void updateQuery(String query)
        Parameters:
        query - the new query to execute

      • getDatabaseMetaData

        DatabaseMetaData getDatabaseMetaData(CredentialsProvider cp)
                              throws SQLException
        Returns the database meta data on the connection.
        Parameters:
        cp - CredentialsProvider to receive user/password from
        Returns:
        DatabaseMetaData on this connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the connection to the database or the statement could not be created

      • getDataTableSpec

        DataTableSpec getDataTableSpec(CredentialsProvider cp)
                        throws SQLException
        Returns a data table spec that reflects the meta data form the database result set.
        Parameters:
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        Returns:
        data table spec
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the connection to the database could not be established

      • createTable

        default BufferedDataTable createTable(ExecutionContext exec,
                                      CredentialsProvider cp)
                               throws CanceledExecutionException,
                                      SQLException
        Read data from database.
        Parameters:
        exec - used for progress info
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        Returns:
        buffered data table read from database
        Throws:
        CanceledExecutionException - if canceled in between
        SQLException - if the connection could not be opened

      • createTable

        default BufferedDataTable createTable(ExecutionContext exec,
                                      CredentialsProvider cp,
                                      boolean useDbRowId)
                               throws CanceledExecutionException,
                                      SQLException
        Read data from database.
        Parameters:
        exec - used for progress info
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        useDbRowId - true if the row id returned by the database should be used to generate the KNIME row id
        Returns:
        buffered data table read from database
        Throws:
        CanceledExecutionException - if canceled in between
        SQLException - if the connection could not be opened

      • createTable

        default BufferedDataTable createTable(ExecutionContext exec,
                                      CredentialsProvider cp,
                                      boolean useDbRowId,
                                      int cachedNoRows)
                               throws CanceledExecutionException,
                                      SQLException
        Read data from database.
        Parameters:
        exec - used for progress info
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        useDbRowId - true if the row id returned by the database should be used to generate the KNIME row id
        cachedNoRows - number of rows cached for data preview or -1 to retrieve all rows
        Returns:
        buffered data table read from database
        Throws:
        CanceledExecutionException - if canceled in between
        SQLException - if the connection could not be opened

      • getTable

        DataTable getTable(ExecutionMonitor exec,
                   CredentialsProvider cp,
                   boolean useDbRowId,
                   int cachedNoRows)
            throws CanceledExecutionException,
                   SQLException
        Read data from database.
        Parameters:
        exec - used for progress info
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        useDbRowId - true if the row id returned by the database should be used to generate the KNIME row id
        cachedNoRows - number of rows cached for data preview
        Returns:
        buffered data table read from database
        Throws:
        CanceledExecutionException - if canceled in between
        SQLException - if the connection could not be opened
